content.rendered:
Directed by Gauravv K. Chawla. Samuel Wilde

Written by Aseem Arrora. Aseem Arrora. Parveez Sheikh. Parveez Sheikh. Samuel Wilde

Cast Radhika Apte (Priya Rai). Saif Ali Khan (Shakun Kothari). Jeniffer Piccinato (Business woman). Chitrangda Singh (Mandira Kothari). Denzil Smith (Kishore Wadhwa). Varun Buddhadev (Young Shakun Kothari). Danish Husain (Dubey). Amrita Tanganiya (News Anchor). Pawan Chopra (Zulfikar). Manish Chaudhari (Rana Dasgupta (as Manish Chaudhary)). Rohan Mehra (Rizwan Ahmed). Karan Singh Chhabra (Stock Market Expert).Sameer Deshpande. Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). Vikram Kapadia (Sandeep Talwar).Ishrat Khan. Sahil Sangha (Vikram Mehra). Sai Gundewar (Suhas Sharma). Shyam Gopal (Jewelry Launch Guest 1). Himanshu Sharma (News Reporter). Rajeev Vashishth (SEBI Inspector). Sonia Balani (Aamna Ahmed). Simran Gangwani (Shakun’s Friend’s Wife). Mukesh Hariawala (Parekh). Mayur Bansiwal (Industrialist). Ravinder Singh Bakshi (Balwinder). Amit Jairath (Sanjay). Ashish Gole (Businessman). Martin Jishil (Venkat Swami)

Language Hindi. French

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Mohan Bangera. Madhu Bhojwani. Hemraj Dogra. Karan Joshi. Ajay Kapoor. Priyanka Mehrotra. Satish Poddar. Ishan Saksena. Sunil Shah. Suraj Shinde. Dheeraj Wadhawan. Samuel Wilde. Rameshchandra Yadav

Production B4U Entertainment. Emmay Entertainment. Kyta Production
